name: Sleep well Ethan
description:
Ethan is a stray cat we adopt. He have a good life now but he is having nightmares. Use dreamcatcher to avoid them.

You can watch the gameplay but i suggest you to play. It's 5 min. game. Comment your best score! You can change the difficulty in game. Hard is really hard :)

Game is builded as a prototype of uniqe mouse controls. Inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy.  But it's a  well polished full experince.
